name: Fairyland: Chronicle
description: Your task is to lead this orc tribe and lead it to prosperity. The game is an interactive fiction stylized as an orc tribe chronicle, which is written by the new Great Tribe Mother.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
